name: PONG (itch) (The Purple Turtle)
description:
A pure Gaming Classic now in a new coat. This game features 1 v 1 gameplay with your friends and family. To show your gaming supremacy be the first one to reach 10 points and be the eternal epic gamer.

The Controls are the WS and UP and Down Keys.

Music used:

"8 Bit Go" By HeatleyBros:

https://youtu.be/-ykzvHU6si8
